price: نو (اوس) د جهنم په دروازو ورننوځئ تلپاتې په هغه كې، د كبرجنو استوګنځى نو خامخا ډېر ناكاره دى.
arabic: فَٱدۡخُلُوٓاْ أَبۡوَٰبَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ فَلَبِئۡسَ مَثۡوَى ٱلۡمُتَكَبِّرِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: fa-ud'khulū abwāba jahannama khālidīna fīhā falabi'sa mathwā al-mutakabirīna
